URolando Mendoza wadubula umpu wakhe iM16 kubakhenkethi.
Baliqela abathinjwa esele behlanguliwe kwaye ubuncinci bathandathu selebefile ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.
Ukubanjwa ngobhongwana izihlandlo ezithandathu, kuquka abantwana nabantu abadala, baye bakhululwa kwwangethuba, ngokunjalo nabafoti base Filipino.
Abafoti bathabatha indawo yenenekazi esele likhulile njengoko lalifuna ilondolo. UMendoza wadutyulwa.
Lowo owayeyiphoyisa lasePhilippines uthumbe izivakashi zaseHong Kong ngokuthumba ibhasi lazo eManila, inhlokodolobha yasePhilippines.
URolando Mandoza wadubula isibhamu sakhe se-M16 ezivakashini.
Izithunjwa ezimbalwa zikhululiwe futhi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi okungenani eziyisithupha zishonile kuze kube manje.
Izithunjwa eziyisithupha, kuhlanganise izingane kanye nabakhulile, zikhululwe masinya, kanjalo nangabathathi bezithombe basePhilippines.
Abathathi bezithombe kamuva bathatha indawo yesalukazi njengoba besidinga indlu yangasese. Umendoza wadutshulwa.
Umzekelo, owona mfanekiso uqhelekileyo wokufotwa komhlaba ngowama-35mm, owawungowona ubungakanani befilimu obubalaseleyo ekupheleni kwexesha lefilimu ye-analog.
Isenziwa nanamhlanje, kodwa ke okubalulekileyo kukuba iratio yayo yathatyathwa yi-digital camera image sensor format.
Intlobo ye-35 mm yazi, ithanda ubhida, 36 mm ukuxwesa ngo-24 mm ubude.
Ifomathi yale reyshiyo (ukwahlulahlula ngeshumi elinesibini ukuze ufumane ireyshiyo yenombolo epheleleyo elula) kuthiwa ngu-3:2.
Iifomathi ezininzi eziqhelekileyo (usapho lweefomathi ze-APS, umzekelo) zilingana okanye ziqikelela kufutshane lo mlinganiso.
Ngokwesibonelo, indlela evamile kakhulu yohlobo lwesithombe emhlabeni ingu-35mm, ewubukhulu obufanayo nobefilimu ekupheleni kwesiqephu senkathi yamafilimu.
Isenziwa nanamuhla, kodwa okubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi ubudlelwane bayo bobude nobukhulu buthathwe izimo zokuthungatha isithombe zekhamera yedijithali.
Ifomethi ka-35mm empeleni, ngodidayo ngokunye, ingu-36mm ububanzi kuphindwe ngo-24mm ubude.
Isilinganiso sobubanzi ebudeni salefomethi (ukudivayida ngeshumi nambili ukuze uthole isilinganiso senombolo ephelele elula) ngakho-ke kuthiwa singu-3:2.
Amafomethi amaningi avamile (iqoqo lamafomethi le-APS, ngokwesibonelo) ayalingana noma acishe alingane nalesi silinganiso sobubanzi ebudeni.
UGqr. Tony Moll wafumanisa Isifo Sephepha Esingawevayo Amayeza (XDR-TB) kummandla oseMzantsi Afrika, KwaZulu-Natal.
Kwi Interview, wathi okutsha okukhethekileyo Kwaku "hlupha kakhulu kwaye kusothusa ngenxa yezinga lokufa eliphezulu."
Ezinye izigulana zisenokuba zisuleleke yontsholongwane esibhedlela, ucinga njalo u Dr. Moll, kwaye ababini kubo ibingabasebenzi basesibhedlela.
Ngexesha lonyaka omnye, umntu osulelekileyo wosulela abantu abasondeleyo abali-10 ukuya kwi-15.
Nangona, ipesenti yeXDR-TB kwiqela lonke Labantu abane tuberculosis lisabonakala lisezantsi; 6 000 yabantu abayi 330 000 abosulelekileyo ngethuba elithile eMzantsi Afrika.
UDkt. Tony Moll wathola Ixhwala Elimelene Nemithi Kakhulu (iXDR-TB) esindeni esiseNingizimu Afrika KwaZulu-Natal.
Uma kuxoxwa naye, uthe uhlobo olusha “luyakhathaza kakhulu futhi luyashaqisa ngenxa yezinga eliphezulu lokubulala.”
Ezinye iziguli zithole igciwane esibhedlela, kucabanga uDkt. Moll, futhi okungenani ababili bekuyizisebenzi zempilo zasesibhedlela.
Ngesikhathi sonyaka owodwa, umuntu othelelekile angathelela abantu asondelene nabo abangu-10 kuya ku-15.
Nokho, isibalo se XDR-TB eningini labantu abaphila nesifo sofuba kubukeka siphansi; u-6,000 wabantu abangu-330,000 abathintekayo nganoma yisiphi isikhathi eNingizimu Afrika.
Lena ibizwa ngokuba yi pH ye khemikali. Ungayenza I indicator usebenzisa incindi yekhaphetshu elibomvu.
Incindi yekhaphetshu itshintsha umbala ngokuxhomekeke ukuba imuncu okanye ikrakra (alkaline) ikemikhali.
Umgangatho we pH uboniswa sisixa se Hydrogen (iH ku pH) ions kwikhemikhali evavanyiweyo.
Iion zeHydrogen ziiproton ezazinee-elektronon zazo ezazihluthiwe (kuba iiathom zeHydrogen zineproton enye kunye ne-elektroni enye).
Lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi i-pH yekhemikhali. Ungenza inkomba ngokusebenzisa umhluzi weklabishi ebomvu.
Ijusi yeklabishi ishintsha umbala kuye ngokuthi ikhemikhali ino-asidi noma i-alikhali engakanani.
Izinga le-pH likhonjwa inani lama-ion weHydrogen (i-H kuyi-pH) kuyikhemikhali elihlolwayo.
Ama-ion weHydrogen amaphrothoni lawo ekususwe ama-elektroni wawo kuwo (njengoba ama-athomu weHydrogen enziwa iphrothoni elilodwa kanye ne-elektroni elilodwa).

Inkulumbuso uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela urhulumente 'Umthetho woMoya Ococekileyo' kwikomiti yamaqela onke ukuba iphonononge, phambi kokufundwa kwayo okwesibini, emva kwentlanganiso yemizuzu engama-25 yangoLwesibini kunye nenkokheli ye-NDP uJack Layton kwi-PMO.
ULayton ucele ukuba kubekho utshintsho kwi conservatives environmental bill kwintlanganiso no PM, ecela ukuba "ibhalwe ngocoselelo olugqibeleleyo" uxwebhu olungendalo lombutho oyiConservative.

Mhlanazana I Federal Government yangenelela ekuthabathethi kuyo ukuxhasa ngezimali isibhedlela I Mersey e Devonport,Tasmania, urhulumente ophetheyo kunye namalungi epalamemete efederali asigxeka esi senzo njengengozi ekhokhela ulonyulo eluzakubakho ngo Novemba.
Kodwa u-Nkulumbuso u-John Howard uthe isenzo senzelwe kuphela ukukhusela amaziko esibhedlele ekuthotyelweni ngurhulumente wase-Tasmania, ngokunika i-AUD engaphezulu kwe-$45 izigidi.

UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela 'Umthetho woMoya Ohlanzekile' ukuba uhlolwe ikomiti lamaqembu onke, ngaphambi kokuba ufundwe okwesibili, ngemva komhlangano wangoLwesibili wemizuzu engu-25 nomhloli weNDP uJack Layton kuyi-PMO.
U-Layton ucele kube nezinguquko endleleni yokukhipha irisidi yesikweletu phakathi nomhlangano nama-PM, ecela kube “nokubhalwa kabusha okuphelele” kwendlela yokukhipha irisidi yesikweletu.

Kusukela ngesikhathi Uhulumeni Wenhlangano Yamazwe ungenela ekuphatheni uxhaso lwesibhedlela i-Mersey eDevonport, eThasmaniya, uhulumeni wezwe kanye namanye amalungu kahulumeni wenhlangano yamazwe asola lesi senzo njengesandulela sokhetho lukahulumeni oluzokwenziwa ngoNovemba.
Kodwa uNdunankulu uJohn Howard uthe umthetho kwakungowokulondoloza izakhiwo zesibhedlela ukuba zingabekwa ezingeni eliphansi uhulumani waseTasmania, ngokunikeza izigidi engu-AUD$45.
Olu phawu “i-up bow” lufana no-V luze lona “u-down bow” afane no-u ojonge ezantsi okanye isikwere isingaphelelanga kwicala langasezantsi.
Ukuphakama kuthetha ukuba kufuneka uqale kwincam kwaye utyhale isaphetha, kwaye ezantsi kuthetha ukuba kufuneka uqale kwisele (apho isandla sakho sibambe khona isaphetha) kwaye utsale isaphetha.
Itolo elimilele-phezulu lidla ngokwenza isandi esiphantsi, ngoxai itolo elimilele ezantsi lomelele kwaye linamandla.
Faka amanqaku akho ipensili ukhululekile, kodwa khumbula ukuba amanqaku okugoba aprintiweyo akhona ngenxa yesizathu somculo, ke kufanele ukuba ahlonitshwe.
Uphawu "lokukhothama umile" olubukeka njengo-V kanti "uphawu lokukhothama phansi" lubukeka njengesigaxa noma isikwele esishoda ngohlangothi lwaso olungaphansi.
Phezulu kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale ekugcineni bese uphusha umcibisholo, kanti phansi kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale exoxweni (okusho ukuthi lapho ubambe khona umcibisholo) bese ugobisa umcibisholo.
Umnsalo ophezulu ujwayele ukwenza umsindo opholile, kanti umnsalo ophansi wenza umsindo onamandla noqinile kakhudlwana.
Zizwe ukhululekile ukubhala izimpawu zakho ngepensela, kepha khumbula izimpawu eziphrintiwe ezehlayo zikhona ngesizathu esingokomculo, ngakho-ke kufanele zihlonishwe.
UGiancarlo Fisichella waphulukana nokulawula imoto yakhe yaye waphuma kumdyarho kamsinya emva kokuba uqalile.
Umdlali weqela lakhe u Fernando Alonso wayekhokhele ebudeni bomdyarho, kodwa wayeka nje ukuba ipiy yakhe ime, mhlawumbe kungenxa yokuba ivili lalibotshwe kakubi.
UMichael Schumacher wayigqiba ireyisi yakhe kungakudalanga kakhulu emva ko Alonso, ngenxa yomonakalo wokuyekiswa namadabi amaninzi ngelixa lereyisi.
UGiancarlo Fisichella wangakwazi ukuqondisa imoto yakhe futhi waqeda umjaho ngokushesha ngomva kokuba uqale.

Abeqembu lakhe u-Fernando Alonso bebephuma phambili cishe kuwoo wonke umjaho, kodwa kuphele ngokushesha nje ngemva kokupaka endaweni yokulungisa imoto, kungenzeka kungenxa yesondo langaphambili elifakwe kabi.
UMichael Schumacher waqeda umjaho wakhe kungekudala ngemva kuka-Alonso, ngenxa yokulimala kwesimo esigcina imoto iphakeme emishikashikeni eminingi phakathi nomjaho.
Ngo-1884, uTesla wafudukela eMerika ukuyakuphangela kwiEdison Company eNew York City.
Ufike e-US eneesentie ezi-4 egameni lakhe, incwadi yemibongo, kunye neleta yengcebiso evela ku-Charles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) ku-Thomas Edison.
Ngo-1884 uTesla wathuthela eMelika ukwamukela umsebenzi neNkampani ka-Edison eDolobheni lase-New York.
Ufike eMelika enamasenti angu-4 kuphela, incwadi yezinkondlo, kanye nencwadi yokutusa evela ku-Charles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe wasemsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) iya kuThomas Edison.

Emizuzwini emihlanu izibonakalisile umoya waqala ukuvuthuza,emva komzuzu, umoya wabe sele ufikelela I 70km/h… kwaze kwalandela imvula, yabe irhabaxa inkulu kangangokuqa ikuqhwabe esikhumbeni okwenaliti, emva koko kweza isichotho samatye esiwa esibhakabhakeni, abantu besoyika futhi bekhwaza yaye bebaleka omnye phezu komnye.
Ndalahlekelwa ngudadewethu netshomi yake, endleleni yam kwaye kukho abantu ababini abakhubazekileyo bekwizitulo zamavili, abantu nje betsiba ngapha kwabo yake bebathyiliza," utshilo uArmand Versace.

Imizuzu emihlanu umbukiso uqalile umoya uqala ukungena, cishe ngemva komzuzu, umoya ufinyelela u-70km/h… bese imvula iyeza, kodwa enzima nenkulu kangangokuba ihlaba isikhumba sakho njengenaliti, bese isichotho sawa emkhathini, abantu bayaxhamazela futhi bayamemeza futhi bayagxobana.

Ngilahlekelwe ngudadewethu kanye nomngane wakhe, futhi endleleni ngilibangise lapho bekunabantu ababili abakhubazekile ababehlezi ezihlalweni ezinamasondo, abantu bebeqa ngaphezulu futhi bebasunduza,” kusho u-Armand Versace.

Nangona ukutya okuninzi kwabo kungaqheleka kuthi, Amaroma analo icala lezidlo ezikhwankqisayo izinto ezinjenge hagu yasendle, pikoko, imisundululu, nohlobo oluthile lwempuku ebizwa ngokuba yi dormouse

Omnye umahluko kukuba ngelixa abantu abahluphekileyo kunye nomntu obhinqileyo besitya ukutya kwabo behleli ezitulweni, amadoda azizityebi ayethanda ukuba nezidlo kunye apho azokuhlala khona emacaleni ngelixa besitya ukutya kwabo.
Isidlo sakudala samaRoma sasingenakuba nakutya kusuka eYuporhu eMerika okanye eAsia kwisentury zakudala.
Umzekelo, babengenawo umbhona, okanye iitumato, okanye iitapile, okanye icocoa, kwaye akukho namnye umRoma wamandulo owakha wangcamla iturkey.

Ngenkathi iningi lokukudla kwabo kungaba okujwayelekile kuthina, amaRoma eyenesabelo sabo sezinto zemikhosi ezingajwayelekile, kubandakanya izingulube zasendle, ipigogo, iminenke, nohlobo lwegundane olubizwa nge-dormouse

Omunye umehluko kwakuwukuthi nakuba abantu abampofu kanye nabesifazane babedla ukudla kwabo babe behlezi ezihlalweni, amadoda acebile ayethanda ukuba namadili ndawonye lapho ayehlala khona ngezinhlangothi kuyilapho edla ukudla kwawo.
Ukudla kwaseRoma yamandulo kwakungeke kuhlanganise ukudla okufike eYurophu kuvela eMelika noma kuvela e-Asia emakhulwini eminyaka alandelayo.
Ngokwesibonelo, babengenawo ummbila, noma otamatisi, noma amazambane, noma i-cocoa, futhi akekho umuntu waseRoma yamandulo oke wanambitha ikalikuni.
I-ASUS Eee PC, eyalonthswa ngaphambili kwihlabathi liphela ukonga iindleko kunye nokusebenza kwayo, yaba sisihloko esishushu kwinyanga ye-IT yaseTaipei ngo-2007.
Kodwa intengiso yabathengi kwikhompyuter yelaptop iya kwahluka kakhulu kwaye itshintshwe emva kokuba i-ASUS yanikezelwa kwi-2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award ngu-Executive Yuan weRiphabhlikhi yase China.
I-ASUS Eee PC, ngaphambili iqalise ukusebenza emhlabeni jikelele ngenxa yezizathu zokonga izindleko nezokusebenza, okwaba wundabamlonyeni ngonyaka ka-2007 ngenyanga yeTaipei IT.

Kepha abathengi bekhompyutha ye-laptop bazohluka kakhulu futhi baguquke ngemva kokuba i-ASUS iklomeliswe Eklomelweni Wokulondoloza wase-Taiwan ngo-2007 ilungu lesiGungu uYuan waseRiphabhulikini yaseShayina.
Zombini i-cyanuric acid nemelamine zafunyanwa kwisampula zomchamo wezilwanyana ezife emveni kokutya ukutya kwezilwanyana okunethyefu.
Iikhompawundi ezimbini ziyadibana zenze izinto eziqaqambileyo anokuqanda umsebenzi wentso, batsho abaphandi bakule yunivesithi.
Abaphandi baqaphela iikristali ezenziwe kumchamo wekati ngokudibanisa i-melamine kunye ne-cyanuric acid.
Ukubumbeka kwezi kristali kufana noko kufunyanwa kumchamo wezilwanyane xa uthelekiswe ne-spectostrophy ye-infrared (FTIR).
Kokubili i-cynuric acid kanye ne-melamine zitholakele kumasampula omchamo ovela ezilwaneni ezifuywayo ezishne ngemva kokudla ukudla kwezilwane okungcolile.
Izakhi ezimbili ziyaxubana ukuze zenze amakristalu angavimba ukusebenza kwezinso, kwasho abacwabingi basenyuvesi.
Abacwaningi bathole ukuthi amakristalu enzeka emchamweni wekati ngokunezeleka kwe-milamine kanye ne-cyanuric acid.
Ukwakheka kwalamakristalu kufana nalokho okutholakale emchamweni wezilwane ezifuywayo ezithintekile uma uqhathaniswa nge-infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
I-Romanticism yayinento enkulu yokuchazwa kwenkcubeko, ethathwe kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, Fichte, noSchlegel.

Kwimeko yeRomaism, iJografi yabumba abantu, kwaye ngokuhamba kwexesha amasiko kunye nenkcubeko enxulumene naloo geografi yavela, kwaye nezi, ngokuhambelana nendawo yoluntu, zazingcono kunemithetho emiselweyo.
Ezothando zinomthelela omkhulu ezinkolelweni zokuziphatha zamasiko, okuthathelwa kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, uFichte, kanye noSchlegel.

Esizindeni seRomanticism, indawo ibumba abantu ngabanye, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi imikhuba nesiko ehlobene naleyo ndawo yavela, futhi lena, ivumelana nendawo yomphakathi, yayingcono kunemithetho emiswe ngokunganaki.
Imuvi, ekudlala kuyo uRyan Gosling no-Emma Stone, iye yanconyelwa imbasa kuzo zonke iikhathegori eziyintloko.
UGosling kunye no-Stone batyunjwe ngengabadlali beqonga ababalaseleyo ngokulandelelana.

Amanye amagama atyunjiweyo abandakanya uMfanekiso oGqwesileyo, uMlawuli, iCinematografi, uyilo lweempahla, ukuhlelwa kwefilimu, Amanqaku oqobo, uyilo lweMveliso, ukuHlela kwesandi, ukuXuba isandi kunye nokuDlala ngokuQala.

IIngoma ezimbini zemuvi, iAudition (The Fools Who Dream) kunye neCity of Stars, zifumene ukunconywa ngeyona ngoma iphambili kweziyilwe ukususela ekuqaleni. iLionsgate studio ifumene uncomelo oluyi-26o - ngaphezulu kwayo nayiphi na enye studiyo.
Ifilimu, eno-Ryan Gosling noEmma Stone, ikhethelwe ukuwina kuzo zonke izigaba ezinkulu.
Ihansana kanye Netshe bakhethelwa ukuthola umklomelo Womdlali Nomdlalikazi Ohamba Phambili ngokulandelana.

Abanye abakhethiwe bahlanganisa neSithombe Esihle Kakhulu, Umqondisi Webhayisikobho, Umklami Wezimpahla, Umhleli-wefilimu, Umculo, Umklamo Womkhiqizo, Ukuhlelwa Komsindo, Ukuhlanganiswa Komsindo kanye Nombhalo weFilimu Wangempela.

Izingoma ezimbili ezivela kuyifilimu, Ukulalela (Iziphukuphuku Eziphuphayo) kanye neDolobha leziNkanyezi, zakhethwa ukuthi zithole umklomelo wengoma yangempela ehamba phambili. Isitshudiyo se-Lionsgate sikhethwe izikhathi ezingu-26 — ukudlula noma esiphi isitshudiyo.
Ngeli lixa iyeza elisalingwayo libonakala likucutha ukubulawa yiEbola,kude kube ngoku, akukho machiza abonakalise ekulungele ukunyanga usuleleko osele lukhona.
Elinye ichiza, iZMapp, belibonakala ngathi liyathembisa kuhlolo, kodwa uphononongo olusemthethweni lubonise ukuba beluneenzuzo ezimbalwa zokuthintela ukufa kunezo bezifunwa.
Kuvavanyo kwe PALM, ZMapp wasebenza njengesilawuli, into ethetha ukuthi ososayensi bayisebenzisa njenge siseko baze bayithelekisa nezinye ezintathu zamachiza.
Nakuba umjovo wokulinga ubonakala ukwazi ukunciphisa ukufa okubangelwa yi-Ebola, kuze kube manje, ayikho imithi eboniswe ngokucacile ukuthi ifanelekela ukulapha isifo esikhona.
I-cocktai eyodwa nje emzimbeni, ZMapp, ekuqaleni ibonakale ithembisa ensimini, kodwa ngokocwaningo kubonisa ukuthi inomthelela omncane kunalowo obucatshwangwa ekuvimbeleni ukufa.
Ekuhloleni kwe-PALM, i-ZMapp yasebenza njengesifaniso, okusho ukuthi ososayensi bayisebenzisa njengesiqalo sokuqhathanisa futhi baqhathanisa amanye amakhambi amathathu okwelapha nayo.
UMartelly ufunge iBhunga elitsha leThutyana loNyulo (i-CEP) lamalungu alithoba izolo.
Ngunyaka ka Martelly's wesihlandlo sesihlanu se-CEP kwiminyaka emine.
Kule nyanga iphelileyo ikomishoni kamongameli icebise ngaphambi kokwehla kwe-CEP iqela lamanyathelo okusondeza izwe ekuvoteni.
Umbutho wayeyimpendulo ka-Martelly kwitoyitoyi zotshintsho ezazisanda ezaqala ngeyeDwarha.
Olunye uqhankqalazo obeluye lubendlongondlongo belubangelwa kukungabanjwa kovoto, olunye ebekumelwe kubanjwe ngonyaka ka-2011.
UMartelly ufungiise i-Provisional Electora Council(CEP) entsha enamalunga ayisishiyagalolunye izolo.
I-CEP yesihlanu eminyakeni emine ka-Martelly.
Ngenyanga edlule ikhomishani yobumongameli ituse ukuyeka isikhundla kwe-CEP kwangaphambili njengengxenye yezinyathelo zokwenza izwe ukuba livote.
Ukwenza bekuwukusabela kukaMartelly ekubhikisheni ngokumelene nohulumeni okusakazekile okuqale ngo-Okthoba.
Ukubhikisha okuba nodlame ngezinye izikhathi kususwe ukuhluleka kokuba nokhetho, olunye okwakufanele lube khona kusukela ngo-2011.
Akukho silumkiso sikhutshiweyo, kwaye ngokwe-arhente yeJakarta geophysics , akukho silumkiso ngetsunami esiya kukhutshwa kuba inyikima ayihlangabezananga nemfuneko ye-6.5.
Ngaphandle kokuba kwakungekho sisongelo se-tsunami, abahlali baqala ukothuka kwaye baqala ukushiya amashishini kunye namakhaya abo.
Akukho isixwayiso sesiphepho esikhishiwe, futhi ngokusho kwesikhungo sezemvelo i-Jakarta, asikho isixwayiso sesiphepho esizokhishwa ngoba lokhu kuzamazama komhlaba akufinyelelanga ubukhulu buka-6.5.
Yize kwakungekho ukusabisa kwe-tsunami, kodwa abahlali baqala baba nokwethuka base beqala beshiya amakhaya abo nama bhizinisi abo.
Ukufika komhlaba kwe-D-Day kunye neemfazwe ezilandelayo zakhulula amantla eFrance, kodwa amazantsi ayengakhululekanga.
Yagwetywa ngama "Vichy" French. Aba yayingabantu baseFrance abenza uxolo Phakathi kwamaJamani ngo 1940 baze basebenza nabahlaseli endaweni yokubalwa.
Nge-15 ka-Agasti ngo-1940, izizwe Ezimanyeneyo zahlasela emzantsi we-France, kwiphulo elibizwa “Operation Dragoon.”
Kwiiveki nje ezimbini, amajoni aseMelika nawaseFransi ayesekhulule umzantsi Fransi ibe ayejonge eJamani.
Ukufika kwamabutho Ahlangene kanye nezimpi ezalandela zakhulula inyakatho yeFulansi, kodwa iningizimu yayingakakhululeki.
Yayibuswa amaFulentshi wase-“Vinchy”. Laba bekungabantu baseFulansi ababenze ukuthula neJalimane ngo-1940 futhi besebenzisana nabaphangi esikhundleni sokuthi balwe nabo.
Ngo-15 Agusti 1940, Izivunani zahlasela iningizimu France, futhi ukuhlasela kwabizwa “Umsebenzi Dragoon”.
Ngamasonto amabili nje amasosha ase-Melika kanye nawase-French Ekhululekile akhiphe iningizimu France ezingxoxweni zokuhweba futhi asephendukela eJalimane
Xa ufowunela umntu okumawakawaka eekhilomitha, usebenzisa isathelayithi.
Isatellite esemoyeni ifumana umnxeba ibesele iwubonakalisa emva , nkokukhawuleza.
Isathelaythi yathunyelwa kwisibhakabhaka yi rokethi. Ososayensi basebenzisa itheleskophu zasemoyeni kuba imo yomhlaba iyaphazamisana nokukhanya kwethu nokubonisisa.
Ithatha i-rocket ebukhulu obungapezulu kwe-100 yenyawo ubudeukuxhoma isatellite okanye i-telescope emajukujukwini.
Uma ushayela ucingo umuntu othile okude ngamamayela ayinkulungwane, usebenzisa isiphuphutheki.
Isiphuphutheki esisemkhathini sithola ucingo bese siluthumela emuva ezansi, cishe ngaleso sikhathi.
Isethilayithi ithunyelwe emkhathini kusentshenziswa i-rocket. Ososayensi basebenzise izibona kude ezisemkhathini ngoba umkhathi uphazamisa okunye kokukhanya kwethu kanye nokubona.
Kudingeka irokhethi enkulu engaphezu kwamafidiangu-100 ukuphakama ukubeka isiphuphutheki noma ithelisikobho emkhathini.

Zininzi iziphumo zokuhlala nezepolitiki njengosetyenziwa kwenkqubo ye-metric, utshintsho kwi-absolutism, ukuya kwi-republicanism ne-nationalism futhi nokholo lokuba ilizwe lelabantu balo hayi umphathi yedwa.
Kwaye emva kokuba umsebenzi weRevolution uvuleleke kubo bonke abafaki zicelo zokuvumela abona banamabhaso nabaphumeleleyo ukuba baphumelele.
Efanayo iya emkhosini kuba endaweni yemikhosi ukuba isekwe kwiklasi ngoku isekwe kwi-cailaber.
Uqhushululu lwaseFrance lukwakhuthaze nabanye abantu abaninzi abacinezelekileyo abasebenza kwamanye amazwe ukuba baqale ezabo iinguqu.

Kunemiphumela eminingi yezenhlalo neyezepolitiki efana nokusetshenziswa kohlelo lokulinganisa ngamamitha, ukusuka ekukholelweni ezimisweni eziphelele kuya ekusekeleni izimiso zoburiphabhuliki, ubuzwe kanye nenkolelo yokuthi izwe elabantu hhayi umbusi oyedwa.
Futhi ngemva kweNguquko izikhundla zazivulekele bonke abesilisa abafake izicelo okwavumela ukuthi abafuna ukuvelela kakhulu nokubahambela kahle baphumelele.
Lokhu kufana nalokhu okwenzeka kumabutho amasosha kunokuba babheke inhlanga yakho bona bakhetha ukubeka i-cailaber ukuze banike amasosha ama-ratings.
Ukuvukela kwaseFulansi kugqugquzele abanye abantu abasebenzayo abacindezelwe bakwamanye abazwe ukuthi baqale ukuvukela kwabo.
Ukususela ngoko uAdekoya ebese-Edinburgh Sheriff Court etyholwa ngokubulala unyana wakhe.
Ubanjiwe kusamelwe ukutyholwa nesigwebo, kodwa ubungqina bamangqina ingaba bubonakele ngenxa yokusasazwa komfanekiso wakhe ngobubanzi.
Esi sisenzo esiqhelekileyo kwenye indawo e-UK kodwa ubulungisa baseScotland busebenza ngokwahlukileyo kwaye iinkundla zikubonile ukupapashwa kweefoto njengezinto ezinokuthi zithintele.
UProfesa Pamela Ferguson waseUniversity of Dundee ubhala esithi "iintatheli ziba sesichengeni ukuba zipapasha iifoto nezinye izinto zabarhanelwa."
I-Crown Office, ejongene nezotshutshiso, ixele intatheli ukuba akukho luphawu luphinde lwenziwe okungenani de kube kubekwa tyala.
u-Adekoya selokhu eseNkantolo ka-Sheriff yas-Edinburgh etheswe icala lokubulala indodana yakhe.
Uboshiwe njengoba esalinde ukubekwa nokuthethwa kwecala, kodwa noma ibuphi ubufakazi bofakazi bokuzibonela bungonakaliswa njengoba isithombe sakhe sishicilelwe kabanzi.
Lena inqubo evamile kwezinye izindawo e-UK kodwa umthetho waseScotland usebenza ngokuhlukile futhi izinkantolo zibone ukushicilelwa kwezithombe njengokungonakalisa.
UProfesa Pamela Ferguson wase Nyuvesi yase-Dundee uyabhala “izintantheli zizibizela amathonsi abanzi ngokushicilela izithombe nokunye kwabasolwa.”
I-Crown Office, okuyiyo ephethe uphenyo, itshele izintatheli ukuthi ngeke iphawule okungenani kuze kube ukuthethwa kwecala.
Abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezine baya eRoma ukuya emngcwabeni.
Inani labantu ababelapho lalilikhulu kangangokuba ayingumntu wonke okwazileyo ukuphinda afikelele kumngcwabo owawuseSt.
Izikrini ezininzi zikamabonakude zafakwa kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo eRoma ukuze abantu babukele umsitho.
Kwezinye izixeko zase Italy nakwihlabathi liphela, ikakhulu e Poland, indlela ekulungiselelwe ngayo ibifana, ebiye izobukelwa ngabantu abaninzi.
Abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyishumi baye enkonzweni yomngcwabo eRoma.
Inani labantu ababekhona lalilikhulu kangangokuba kwakungenzeki ukuba wonke umuntu angene enkonzweni yomngcwabo eSt. Peter's Square.
Izikrini ezinkulu eziningana zethelevishini zifakiwe ezindaweni ezihlukahlukene eRoma ukwenzela ukuthi abantu babukele umcimbi.
Kwamanye amazwe amaningi waseNtaliyane nasemhlabeni wonke, ngokukhethekile ePholandi, ukumiswa okufanayo kwenziwe, okubukwe abantu abaningi kakhulu.
Nangona abantu abathathu babengaphakathi endlwini xa imoto ibiyigilisa, akukho namnye kubo owonzakeleyo.
Kunjalo, umqhubi ufumene ukulimala okumandla entloko.
Indlela apho ingozi yenzeke khona iye yavalwa okwethutyana ngexesha abeenkonzo zoncedo olungxamisekileyo bekhulula umqhubi kwi-Audi TT ebomvu.
Waye wangeniswa kuqala kwisibhedlela i-James Paget Hospital e-Great Yarmouth.
Waye watshintshelwa kwisibhedlela I-Addenbrooke's Hospital eCambridge.
Nakuba bekunabantu abathathu phakathi kwendlu ngenkathi imoto iyishayisa, akekho kubo olimele.
Noma kunjalo, umshayeli uthole izingozi ezimbi ekhanda.
Umgwaqo lapho inhlekelele yenzeka khona wavalwa okwesikhashana ngesikhathi izisebenzi zezimo eziphuthumayo zikhulula umshayeli kuyi-Audi TT ebomvu.
Uqale wangeniswa esibhedlela sase-James Paget e–Yarmouth eNkulu.
Ngokulandelayo uye watholakala eSibhedlela i-Addenbrooke e-Cambridge.

Ibhola ekhatywayo yelizwe lase-Italiya, kunye neqela lesizwe lebhola laseburhulumenteni laseJamani liqela lesibini eliphumeleleyo kwihlabathi kwaye babengabaphumeleleyo kwiNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola eKhatywayo ngo-2006

Imidlalo edumileyo ibandakanya ibhola ekhatywayo, ibhola yomnyazi, ibhola yevoli, ipolo yamanzi, ukubiyela, umbhoxo, ukukhwela ibhayisikile, ihoki yomkhenkce, ihoki yokugudla kunye nomdyarho weemoto weF1.
Eyasebusika imidlalo idumile kwiinginqgi zaseMantla, nama-Taliyani ekukhuphiswano lemidlalo yeHlabathi nemidlalo yee-Olympics.
Ibhola lezinyawo lezwe laseNtaliyane, kanye neqembu lebhola lezinyawo lezwe laseJalimane iqembu lesibili eliphumelele kakhulu emhlabeni futhi bekuyizingqwele zeNdebe yoMhlaba yeFIFA ngo-2006.

Imidlalo ethandwayo ihlanganisa ibhola lezinyawo, i-basketball, i-volleyball, ibhola lasemanzini, umngcweko, iragbhi, ukugibela amabhayisikili, ihoki yaseqhweni, ihoki evamile kanye nomncintiswano wezimoto zeF1.
Imidlalo yasebusika ithandwa kakhulu ezindaweni eziseNyakatho, lapho amaNtaliyane encintisana khona emidlalweni yamazwe onke kanye nasemidlalweni yama-Olimpiki.
UMuhammad wayenomdla kakhulu kwimicimbi engaphaya kobomi bemihla ngemihla. Wayehlala esiya emqolombeni owaziwa ngokuba ngu "Hira'" kwiNtaba yase "Noor" (ukukhanya) eyokucinga.
wayivingca, wasinda kulomaxesha, unika umfanekiso ocacileyo wokuthambekela kokomoya kukaMuhammad.
Ukuphumla phezu kweentaba ezisemantla e Mecca,umqolomba ulikheswa kwihlabathi liphela.
Ngapha koko, akukho lula tu ukufumanisa nokuba umntu ebesazi ukuba ikho. Nje ukuba ungene ngaphakathi emqolombeni,kukuba wedwa.
Akikho nto engabonwa ngaphandle kwamafu acwengileyo, amahle phezulu neentaba ezininzi ezirhangqileyo.Kuncinci okwelihlabathi okunobonakala okanye kuvakale ngaphakathi emqolobeni.
UMuhammad wayenesithakazelo esijulile ezindabeni zokuphila ezingaphathelene nezinto zalomhlaba. Wayevame ukuya emhumeni owaziwa ngokuthi “iHira” eNtabeni “yeNoor” (ukukhanya) ukuze ayozindla.
Umhume ngokwawo, obekhona kuze kube manje, unikeza isithombe esicacile sokuthambekela okungokomoya kukaMuhammad.
Umhume ohlezi phezu kwenye yezintaba zasenyakatho yase-Mecca, ukude kakhulu nomhlaba wonke.
Eqinisweni, akulula ukuyithola ngisho noma wazi ukuthi ikhona. Uma isingaphakathi emhumeni isuke isihlukaniswe ngokuphelele.
Akukho okubonakalayo phezulu ngaphandle kwesibhakabhaka esibalele, esihle kanye nezintaba eziningi ezizungezile. Kuncane kakhulu okwalelizwe okubonakalayo noma okuzwakalayo uma uphakathi emgedeni.
Ngaphandle kwe-iventi yangoLwesithathu, uCarpanedo wakhuphisana kwimidyarho yeeNtshatsheli.
Eyokuqala yakhe yayiSlalom, apho wafumana AWUGQIBANGA kumtyibilizo wakhe wokuqala. Abadlali abayi-36 kwabayi-116 nabo bafumana iziphumo ezifanayo kula mtyibilizi.

Olunye ugqatso lakhe, iGalant Slalom, yambona egqiba kwindawo yeshumi kwiqela labafazi elihleliyo kunye nexesha lokubaleka elidibeneyo le-4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 imizuzu ecothayo kunendawo yokuqala yokugqiba iAustria uClaudia Loesch kunye nemizuzu eyi-1: 09.02 kancinci kunendawo yesithoba Kugqitywe uGyöngyi Dani waseHungary.
Ii-skiers ezine kwiqela lamanina elihleliyo loyisakele ukugqibezela ithuba lalo, kwaye abayi 45 kwi 117 skiers kwi Giant Salom boyisiwe ukuphumelela kwimbaleko.
Ngale kwesehlakalo sangolwesithathu, uCarpanedo uncintisane emijahweni emibili ngayinye yobuShampeni.
Umncintiswano wakhe wokuqala bekuyi-Slalom, lapho Engaqedanga khona umncintiswano wakhe wokuqala. Abancintisanayo abangu-36 kwabangu-116 bathole imiphumela efanayo kulowo mncintiswano.

Omunye umjaho wakhe, i-Giant Slalom, waqeda engoweshumi eqenjini labesifazane elalihlezi nesikhathi esihlanganisiwe esingu-4:41.30, wayesemuva ngo-2:11.60 kuu-Austrian Claudia Loesch owathatha indawo yokuqala futhi wayesemuva ngo- 1:09.02 k-uGyöngyi Dani wase-Hungary owaqeda ekwindawo yesishiyagalolunye.
Abashushuluza eqhweni abane eqenjini labesifazane abahlezi bahluleke ukuqeda imijaho yabo, futhi abangu-45 kwabangu-117 abashushuluza eqhweni eSlalom eNkulu bahluleke ukuthola izikhundla emjahweni.
Ibhombu enye yadubula ngaphandle kweofisi Yeruluneli Jikelele
Ezinye iibhombu ezintathu zaqhuma kufutshane nezakhiwo zikarhulumente kwisithuba seeyure ezimbini.
Ezinye iingxelo zibeka inani elisemthethweni lokufa kwabantu abasibhozo, kwaye iingxelo ezisemthethweni ziqinisekisa ukuba i-30 yenzakele; kodwa amanani okugqibela awaziwa.
Ibhomu eyodwa iqhume ngaphandle kwehhovisi likandunankulu.
Amabhomu amanye amathathu aqhumile eduze nezakhiwo zikahulumeni esikhathini samahora amabili.
Eminye imibiko ithi inani labafile elisemthethweni isishiyagalombili, futhi umbiko osemthethweni uqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abangaba ngu-30 balimele; kepha izinombolo zokugcina azikaziwa.
Ehambhweni lwakhe, u-Iwasaki wadibana neengxaki kwamaxesha amaninzi.
Wakhuthuzwa zi-pirates, wahlaselwa eTibet yinja enomgada, wabaleka umtshato eNepal waya kubanjwa eIndiya.
Phakathi naloluhambo, u-Iwasaki wahlangabezana nezinkinga kaningi.
Ubanjwe inkunzi yizigcwelegcwele zasolwandle, wahlaselwa yinja enesifo sobuhlanya e-Tibet, wabalekela umshado e-Nepal bese waboshwa eNdiya.
Kwamsinya emva kokuqhambuka kwengxwabangxwaba, iBritani yaqalisa ukuvala ulwandlwe lwaseJamani isebenzisa umkhosi waselwandle.
Icebo labonakala lisebenza, ukuqhawula inkxaso ebalulekileyo yamajoni nabazinzi, nangona olu thintelo lophula umthetho ekakuvunyelwene ngawo kwizivumelwano zehlabathi kwisenturi ezimbini ezadlulayo.
IBritani yombe amanzi amazwe ukuze inqande iinqanawe ukuba zingene kwiindawo zolwandle, isonzakalisa neenqanawa ezimsulwa.
Kuba kwakungekho impendulo inqabileyo kweli qhinga, iJamani yayilindele impendulo efanayo kumlo wayo waselwandle ongathintelwanga.
Ngokushesha ngemva kobutha, iBrithani yaqala ukuvimbezela iJalimane ngemikhumbi.

Isu libonakale lisebenza, ukususwa kwezinto ezidingwa ibutho lamasosha nabantu abavamile, nakuba lokhu kuvimbela kuphule imithetho yamazwe wonke elungiswe izivumelwano zamazwe amaningana wamakhulu amabili eminyaka adlule.
I-Britain imba amanzi ezwekazi ukuze ivimbele imikhumbi ukuthi ingene kuyo yonke ingxenye yolwandle, okubangela izingozi ngisho nasemikhunjini evamile.
Njengoba bekunokusabela okulinganiselwe kulendlela, iJalimane beyilindele ukusabela okufanayo empini yayo engavinjelwe yemikhumbi yangaphansi kwamanzi.
Emva kokuba idama lakhiwe ngo-1963, izikhukula zamaxesha athile ezaziza kusasaza intlenga kuwo wonke umlambo zamiswa.
Ezi ngqimba bezifuneka ukuze kwenziwe iingqimba zesanti namalwandle aza kuba yindawo yokuhlala izilwanyana zasendle.
Ngenxa yoko, iintlobo ezimbini zeentlanzi ziye zaphela kumhlaba wonke, kwaye ezinye ezimbini zibe sengozini, kubandakanya ne-humpback chub.
Nangona izinga lamanzi liyakunyuka ukuya kutsho kancinane ezinyaweni emva kwezikhukhula, amagosa anethemba ayakonela ukubuyisela imigqaliselo yesanti ekhukhulisekileyo ngumsinga.
Ngemva kokuba kwakhiwe idamu ngo-1963, izikhukhula zenkathi ethile yonyaka ezazisabalalisa inzika emfuleni wonke zamiswa.
Lenzika beyidingeka ekwenzeni izindunduma zesihlabathi nezingu, ezisebenza njengendawo yokuhlala yezilwane zasendle.
Ngenxa yalokho, izinhlobo ezimbili zezinhlanzi zaqothulwa, futhi ezinye ezimbili zibe sengozini, kuhlanganise ne-humpback chub.
Nakuba izinga lamanzi lizokhuphuka kuphela amafidi ambalwa ngemva kwesikhukhula, iziphathimandla zithemba ukuthi lizokwanela ukuvuselela izindunduma zesihlabathi ezigugulekile ezansi nomfula.
Uqhwithela lweshumi oluthiywe njengeNkanyamba yeAtlantic, iStrokropical Jerry, luye lwayileka kuLwandle lweAtlantiki namhlanje.
i-National Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi xa kunje u-Jerry akayongozi kule ndawo.
Isiphepho seshumi esinikwe igama senkathi yeziPhepho zase-Atlantic, iSiphepho Sendawo Efudumele uJerry, saqala oLwandlekazini i-Atlantic namuhla.
INational Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi kulenkathi iJerry ingaba nosongo ezweni.
IJapan ineziqithi ezikufuphi ku-7000 (eyona inkulu iyiHonshu),iyenze iJapan ibe sesona siqithi sikhulu ehlabathini.
Ngenxa yeziqhu zeziqithi enazo iJapan, ElaseJapani lidla ngokubizwa kwijiyografi njenge, "archipelago"
Ijapani ineziqhingi ezicishe zibe ngu-7000 (esikhulu kunazo zonke iHonshu), okwenza iJapani isiqhingi sesi-7 esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni!
Ngenxa yenqwaba/iqembu leziqhingi iJapani enazo, iJapani ivame ukubizwa ngokuthi, ngenxa yendawo ekuyo, njenge-"archipelago"
I-China yakudala yayinendlela eyahlukileyo yokubonisa amaxesha ahlukeneyo; Inqanaba ngalinye lase China okanye usapho ngalunye olwalusemagunyeni lwaluludidi olwahlukileyo.

Kwakhona phakathi kobukumkani ngabunye kwakukho iminyaka engazinzanga yamaphondo ohlukeneyo. Elona laziwa kakhulu kula maxesha yayilixesha leThree Kingdoms epoch elenzeka iminyaka engama-60 phakathi kweHan neJin Dynasty.
Ngalamathuba imfazwe embi yayiqhubeka phakathi kwabasebukhosini belwela itrone.
Ixesha leThree Kingdoms lelona kwabulawa abantu abaninzi ngalo kwimbali yeTshayina Yakudala, abantu abaninzi bafa belelwa ukuhlala kwesona sihlalo siphakamileyo kwibhotwe eliphezulu eXi’an.
IShayina yamandulo yayinendlela ehlukile yokuveza izinkathi ezihlukile; isigaba ngasinye seShayina noma umndeni ngamunye owawubusa wawuwubukhosi obuhlukile.

Futhi phakathi kobukhosi ngabunye kwakuyiminyaka engazinzile yezifundazwe ezihlukene. Inkathi eyaziwa kakhulu kulezi kwakuyinkathi yemibuso emithathu eyenzeka iminyaka engama-60 phakathi koMbusokaHan noJin.
Phakathi nalesi sikhathi kwakuba nezimpi ezinodlame phakathi kwababusi belwela ubukhosi.

IMibuso Emithathu kwakungenye yenkathi yegazi eliningi kunazo zonke emlandweni waseShayina yakuDala, izinkulungwane zabantu zafa zilwela ukuhlala esihlalweni esiphakeme kakhulu esigodlweni esihle e-Xi’an.
